name: NapO'Clock
0:
”Alexa, use nap o'clock to play the vacuum sound”
”Alexa, use nap o'clock to play the fan sound”
”Alexa, use nap o'clock to play the womb sound”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: nap o'clock
des: Allow your loved one to blissfully nap in your arms at a moment's notice without having to worry about holding a separate device and your baby at the same time. Simply ask Alexa to use Nap O'Clock and pick from eithert a vaccum, wind, fan, womb or rain sound and it will continue to play that sound until your loved one is asleep.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
